instructions: place dinner plate on the bottom middle of table cloth
place dinner fork with tines pointing upwards to the left of the dinner plate
place the salad fork with tines pointing upward to the left of the dinner fork
place the dinner knife with the blade facing the right of the dinner plate
place the salad knife with the blade pointing toward the dinner knife
place the soup spoon with the bowl facing up to the right of the salad knife
place the water glass on the top right of the dinner plate
place the wine glass to the right of the water glass
place another wine glass to the right of the wine glass
place the coffee cup to the right of the soup spoon
place the bread plate above the fork
place a butter knife on the top right edge of the bread plate
place the dessert fork above the dinner plate with the tines facing up and to the right
place the dessert spoon above the dessert fork with the bowl facing up and to the left
place the napkin in the middle of the dinner plate
